Text: Ben Stein of "Expelled" fame? That's one interview I can live without. Anyways, thanks for the upload!

Agreed, Ben Stein is a legendarily specious asshole - and from all personal accounts, a basic arrogant dick as well. Why anyone has him on, i really don't get... He's famous for absolutely nothing. Is 'lame-ous' a word? 

BUT... I like Ferguson, and sincerely appreciate the up and all s/l's. Thx again, TvTeam!
